afterAll.description: afterAll function is called once after all specs

afterEach.description: afterEach function is called once after each spec

beforeAll.description: beforeAll function is called once before all specs

beforeEach.description: beforeEach function is called once before each spec

describe.only.description: creates a describe block that runs only once

describe.skip.description: creates a describe block that will be skipped

template:cut.description: creates a template to test a class under test

test.only.description: creates a test block  that runs only once

test.skip.description: creates a test block that will be skipped
